title: Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Hits Historic Triple after Pogačar Crashes out of Contention – ‘I Had to Go for It’
content:
Pogačar overshoots corner and crashes deep into the final of wild ride through 'Hell of the North,' holds off chase group for second place on debut.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Hits Historic Triple after Pogačar Crashes out of Contention – ‘I Had to Go for It’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
